item.title: Remove the Barriers
item.description: The key to success is quite often getting started. The laws of conservation of energy apply to the macro scale of our lives as much as they do to the basic physical principles of the universe. A body at rest will remain at rest, while a body in motion will remain in motion. For anyone who’s ever tried to “get in shape” the starting of that routine is often done with sheer willpower.
